sen.j: 江戸時代初期禅僧（黄檗宗）独照性円が没蹤庵を建てたのに始まる。
sen.e: Jikishi-an Temple began as a thatched hut named Mossho-an that was built by early Edo period Buddhist monk (Obaku Sect) Dokusho Shoen.

sen.j: その後荒廃し、幕末に浄土宗の寺として再興されたのが現在の直指庵である。
sen.e: It later fell into ruin, and at the end of the Edo period was restored as the Pure Land Sect temple that stands today.
